intro: Brachystelma barberae, commonly known as the barber's starry stonecrop, is a succulent plant native to South Africa. Its flowers are small, star-shaped, and often display a range of colors, including white, pink, and red. Brachystelma barberae is well adapted to drought conditions, storing water in its thick, fleshy stems and leaves.
